Why, What,

Why do I do
what I do
and how do I do it?

  • Tell Me More

Machines do not get tired of helping humans
I want to build machines that extend human boundaries

  • Go on

Machines enable humans to transcend their boundaries

They are becoming autonomous cars so you can be
creative while travelling. They have become auto-pilots
to help make flying safer. They allow platforms
like Coursera get the right education to you. They
allow you to manage entire libraries worth of research
from your desktop. They keep you safe. And they enable
you to build more of their cousins.

  • Keep going

  • Feature 6

Remotely Operated Vehicle

While the humans look for life in space, we
are constantly mesmerized by the life in
our oceans. For our final year project at
university, we built a remotely operated
underwater vehicle. It had a torpedo
shaped design with fins on the vessel's rear
to control it.

Text prediction

Humans want to be creative all the time.
To save them time to hone their creativity
we built a text prediction application. We
found this very useful while building our
own RShiny application.

  • More of what I do

Afiniti

Humans tend to connect better with some
people and not with others. At Afiniti we try
to pair the right agent to the right caller in
contact centers so that they are both happy.
